item.title: Israel ended an 11-week blockade on aid entering Gaza - but the UN's humanitarian chief says only five lorries got in and the aid hasn't reached anyone yet. It warns 14,000 babies could die there in the next 48 hours. #Gaza #Israel #KeirStarmer #Aid #UN #
item.description: Israel ended an 11-week blockade on aid entering Gaza - but the UN's humanitarian chief says only five lorries got in and the aid hasn't reached anyone yet. It warns 14,000 babies could die there in the next 48 hours. #Gaza #Israel #KeirStarmer #Aid #UN #

item.title: The United Nations said it's been given permission by Israel to send "around 100" aid trucks into Gaza - it comes after warnings from the UN's humanitarian chief that 14,000 babies in Gaza could die over the next 48 hours if aid supplies don't reach them.
item.description: The United Nations said it's been given permission by Israel to send "around 100" aid trucks into Gaza - it comes after warnings from the UN's humanitarian chief that 14,000 babies in Gaza could die over the next 48 hours if aid supplies don't reach them.

item.title: In response, Israel's foreign affairs spokesman said that if the UK wants to harm its economy "due to anti-Israel obsession and domestic political considerations", then that is the country's "own prerogative". #UK #Israel #Gaza #Politics #UKNews #MiddleEa
item.description: In response, Israel's foreign affairs spokesman said that if the UK wants to harm its economy "due to anti-Israel obsession and domestic political considerations", then that is the country's "own prerogative". #UK #Israel #Gaza #Politics #UKNews #MiddleEa
